title: ranked reward
body:
hello ! i just have a little question : will I be able to get the ranked reward if i had a 10 game chat restriction 2 week ago ?

thank yoU !

replies.body: From what I understand, as long as you complete the restrictions before the season ends then you'll be find!  If you have any questions or concerns, reach out to the PB community on the [PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)!  Hope that helps!
